title: Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
Remote code execution vulnerability detected in web application server. Attacker can execute arbitrary commands with system privileges.

**Impact**: System compromise
**CVSS**: 9.8
**References**: CVE-2024-1234

title: SQL Injection in Login Form
description:
SQL injection vulnerability identified in authentication endpoint. Potential for unauthorized database access.

**Affected Component**: /api/auth/login
**Impact**: Data breach
**CVSS**: 8.5

title: Outdated SSL Certificate
description:
SSL certificate expiring in 7 days. Renewal required to maintain secure communications.

**Expiration**: 2024-01-27T00:00:00.000Z
**Domain**: example.com

title: Missing Security Headers
description: HTTP security headers not properly configured. Recommended headers: X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS.

title: New User Account Created
description: New administrative user account 'system_admin' created outside normal business hours.

title: Multiple Failed Login Attempts
description:
Detected 100+ failed login attempts from IP 192.168.1.100 within 5 minutes.

**Source IP**: 192.168.1.100
**Time Range**: 2024-01-20T12:00:00Z to 2024-01-20T12:05:00Z
**Target**: admin@example.com

title: Unencrypted Data Transfer
description:
Internal service communicating over HTTP instead of HTTPS.

**Service**: payment-processor
**Port**: 8080
**Protocol**: HTTP

title: Sensitive Data Exposure
description:
Credit card numbers detected in plain text log files.

**Location**: /var/log/payments.log
**Impact**: PCI DSS non-compliance
**Data Type**: Credit Card Numbers
